summary: This document contains subscriber information related to J. Epstein and other individuals, including details about their accounts with Cingular Wireless. It includes a subpoena issued by the State Attorney's Office in Palm Beach County, Florida, demanding the appearance of individuals for interrogation in an ongoing investigation.

persons.name: J. Epstein
persons.context: J. Epstein is identified as a financially liable party with an active account at Cingular Wireless, with details about his billing address and contact information.

persons.name: Thomas RoFrano
persons.context: Thomas RoFrano is mentioned as another subscriber with an active account at Cingular Wireless.

events.title: Cingular Wireless Subscriber Information Release
events.description: Cingular Wireless provided subscriber information for J. Epstein and others in response to a subpoena.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: A subpoena was issued by the State Attorney's Office in Palm Beach County, commanding individuals to appear for interrogation in an ongoing investigation.

locations: 401 North Dixie Highway, West Palm Beach, Florida
keyFacts: J. Epstein is listed as a financially liable party with an active account at Cingular Wireless.
The document includes a subpoena from the State Attorney's Office in Palm Beach County.
Thomas RoFrano is also mentioned as a subscriber with an active account.
The document contains sensitive and confidential information intended for specific recipients.
There are multiple references to the need for compliance with legal requests and subpoenas.
